text: Ritva Annikki Vepsä (12 February 1941 – 30 July 2016) was a Finnish actress. She was born in Helsinki, Finland. In 1970 she received a Jussi Award as the Best Leading Actress for her appearances in a Jörn Donner movie Sixtynine 69 and a Risto Jarva movie Ruusujen aika. Vepsä died on 30 July 2016, aged 75, at her home from lung cancer.Actress Ritva Vepsä passes away == References == == Other websites == * Category:1941 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Finnish movie actors Category:Actors from Helsinki Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Finland
title: Ritva Vepsä
